casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Crystal Gail MANGUM. No. 286P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Dec. 15, 2015. Ann B. Petersen, Chapel Hill, for Mangum, Crystal Gail.

James R. Glover, Chapel Hill.

Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Crystal Gail Mangum, for Mangum, Crystal Gail. Roger A. Echols, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th of August 2015 by Defendant to Withdraw Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of December 2015."
